blogPost.excerpt: GlamAR is a virtual makeup try-on, designed for beauty and cosmetic brands. Integrate with your brand website or app to help customers try-on products live, directly from their mobile or laptop.
blogPost.body: GlamAR is a virtual makeup try-on, designed for beauty and cosmetic brands. Integrate with your brand website or app to help customers try-on products live, directly from their mobile or laptop.
blogPost.title: GlamAR - Augmented Reality platform for a seamless try on experience
blogPost.author: Farooq Adam

localize.description: Glamar是一种虚拟化妆试穿，专为美容和化妆品品牌设计。与您的品牌网站或应用程序集成，帮助客户直接从手机或笔记本电脑现场试用产品。
localize.tagline: 无缝体验体验的增强现实平台

localize.description: Glamar是一種虛擬化妝試穿，專爲美容和化妝品品牌設計。與您的品牌網站或應用程序集成，幫助客戶直接從手機或筆記本電腦現場試用產品。
localize.tagline: 無縫體驗體驗的增強現實平臺

previous.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
previous.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job

localize.description: 如果你想活得更好，活得更长，你就必须进行体育锻炼。西蒙说，这会激励你在白天做简单的锻炼。加入我们与坐姿疾病的斗争吧。
如果你想活得更好，活得更長，你就必須進行體育鍛煉。西蒙說，這會激勵你在白天做簡單的鍛鍊。加入我們與坐姿疾病的鬥爭吧。

next.excerpt: Bird Buddy is a smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors, captures their photos and organizes them in a beautiful collection.
next.title: Bird Buddy - A smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors

localize.description: Bird Buddy是一款智能的鸟类喂食器，它可以通知你有羽毛的访客，捕捉他们的照片，并将他们组织成一个美丽的集合。
localize.tagline: 一个智能的鸟类喂食器，它会通知你有羽毛的访客

localize.description: Bird Buddy是一款智能的鳥類餵食器，它可以通知你有羽毛的訪客，捕捉他們的照片，並將他們組織成一個美麗的集合。
localize.tagline: 一個智能的鳥類餵食器，它會通知你有羽毛的訪客
